question: Do you prefer designing and implementing rather than monitoring and detecting?
Do you want to develop the system infrastructure in the area of security mainly?

answers.description: Security Engineer is a person which responsible not only for planning, but also for implementing security strategy and then maintaining all security solutions.

question: Do you want to specialize in the area of security?

answers.description: IT Security Specialist is a person whose job is to develop and maitain an infrastucture that will protect system. What is more, this person also has to carry out control tests, analyse results and monitore whole system.
IT Infrastructure Administartor is a person who deals with IT infrastructure and network systems from within the company. It supports users and makes sure that everything runs smoothly.

question: Are you mainly interested in network solutions?

answers.description: Network Engineer is a person responsible for the design and configuration of networks, including LAN, WAN and some external connections.
Infrastructure Engineer is a person who, thanks to its abilities, can implement solutions for digital networks and systems and then maintain and coordinate them so that they fulfill the proper task.
